item.title: Preliminary Explorations on UL2 and Second-order Optimizers
item.description: In the field of large language models, the most important recipes to cook the model is not opened to publics. Model architecture itself is quite well-known because many state-of-the-art models are now open weights, and in many cases we find it is a boringly simple vanilla transformers. But for datasets and training objectives it is not well known, and many LLM builders deliberately obfuscates the details of these two. And,

item.title: Learning rate 튜닝
item.description: Learning rate는 Ian Goodfellow의 Deep Learning 책에도 나오듯 가장 중요한 하이퍼파라미터라고 할 수 있다. 또 그만큼 중요한 하이퍼파라미터가 바로 learning rate를 어떻
